title: Bug 49299 - Incorrect behavior with custom cookie name and URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299 - Servlet 3.0 chapter 7.1.1 states that custom cookie name affects URL rewriting.
OB: The page sends a cookie named MYSESSIONCOOKIE with a session ID value, but the Reload link on the page uses 'jsessionid' instead of the custom cookie name. Example: http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;jsessionid=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F4.
EB: The expected behavior is that the Reload link should use the custom cookie name instead of 'jsessionid'. Example: http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;MYSESSIONCOOKIE=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F.
